name: Error Hunter mobile
description:
INSTRUCTION

Control the Mac with your finger, shoot the bugs and don't touch them.

 Red errors slow down the Mac. 

Yellow errors speed up red errors on the screen. 

The green shield removes all red errors.

 Bonus "Shield" - drag the shield and break the bugs, The Big Red Bug breaks the shield. 

Shield Bonus "Shield"

The CRT button turns on the CRT effect

Click on the Windows icon to get extra points

Windows icon

When you click on the mine icon, all enemies explode

Mr. Folder is your assistant who shoots back from mistakes

The main character of the game is Mr. Mac, who protects the computer from errors. They called him the Error Hunter. Mac has a friend - Mr. Folder, the hero of another game of the same name, who helps him fight off the attack.
